General.Name: Max India Limited
General.Description: Max India Limited provides services related to senior living communities. It owns, develops, constructs, operates, and establishes residential senior living communities. The company provides daily living and memory care, and specialized care services; management and consultancy, and shared services, as well as MedCare products. In addition, it offers learning and development activities; and leasing of real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Advaita Allied Health Services Limited. Max India Limited was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Noida, India.
